Package io.github.imunsmart

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.imunsmart.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The main controller class for our JavaFX Production application Currently handles H2 database, SQL and events from our UI.
    Since:
    9/19/2020
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Devin

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event when add product button is pressed, inserts values from UI into H2 database using SQL, assuming valid fields are entered.
      void disconnect()
      Closes the connection when the program is exited.
      void employeeLogin​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Gets information from text fields and attempts to login, fires when login button is pressed.

      Main initialization method.

      Event when record production button is pressed, inserts values from UI into H2 database using SQL.

      Gets information from text fields and attempts to register, fires when register button is pressed.
      java.lang.String reverseString​(java.lang.String pw)
      Reverses a string recursively (used for basic file encryption).
      void showDialog​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message)
      Creates a new popup dialog with the specified title and message.
      static void testMultimedia()
      Tests the functionality of the multimedia interface.

      • showDialog

        public void showDialog​(java.lang.String title,

        Creates a new popup dialog with the specified title and message. The popup forces application modality so users must close the popup before continuing.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the dialog box
        message - the message of the dialog box
